column4: Hello, I just installed a tv tuner card how do I tell if my comp detects it/ what drivers should I use?
lspci I think will let you see if it's detected.
ok it does detect it. How would I find a driver? Any way to use the windows driver from the companies website?
I'm not sure, the mythtv folks probably have a much better idea than I do.  I never did get mine working under linux :(
